name: The Lurker
description: The Lurker is a Horror Adventure Game, where your main goal is to find a way and escape the house you were so eager to explore. Using only your flashlight as a main source of light, you must solve the mysteries of this place, while avoiding the mansion’s avenging spectre, that lurks in the shadows. Can you survive and make it out of the house, while lifting the curse that has befallen on it?
